short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This program allows users to enter in the URL for any GIF or meme they choose and set the image as a background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schoology is the epitome of boredom so I decided to make an extension that allows users to change the plain/white background to any image of their choosing. Simply look up an image or gif online, right-click and select "copy image address," and finally copy and paste the URL into the space provided.
